question: The Reserve Bank Of India (RBI) initiated the Prompt Corrective Action against this bank activities.
explanation: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) initiated prompt corrective action (PCA) on Bank of Maharashtra placing a restriction on the banking activities. This is the sixth bank to be placed under PCA by the RBI, the other 5 banks are Central Bank of India, IDBI Bank, UCO Bank, Dena Bank and Indian Overseas Bank.
